name: Runners (gurankas)
description: “Runners” is a 3D third-person endless runner game for PC which uses one button to control the character. The player’s aim is to run as far as they possibly can across one lane with different obstacles, before they lose, to achieve a high score. By tapping space button one or twice, the player must avoid the oncoming obstacles. On the way, the player will encounter checkpoints as well as coins that will add extra time points. If the time runs out, the player loses.
